about_the_game:
Golden Feather is a short point-and-click game inspired by the fairy tale of the Brothers Grimm. A story that will take you on an unforgettable journey and offer a delightful narrative. The captivating visuals and interesting tasks will keep you entertained. Allow yourself to relax and immerse yourself in this atmospheric fairy tale.

Can a fool become a king?

This is the story of the adventure of a young prince a fool, who embarks on a journey to find the golden bird at the king’s command, but along the way, he encounters something far more valuable. To reach a fairy tale ending, the fool must solve many riddles and show courage, for only the best can become king.

Quiet and Peaceful

Tired of constant stress and negativity? Allow yourself to unwind! This story is free of any negativity or obstacles, of good or evil. It’s a fairy tale for one evening that will bring you peace, and the beautiful visuals and pleasant music will help you dive into a fantastical world.

 

Ready for an adventure?
In every fairy tale, the hero gets a happy ending, but it’s not easy—prepare yourself! In this magical world, many exciting things await you!

  • Many locations

  • Quests and puzzles

  • Secrets and collectible items

  • Pleasant soundtracks

 The game uses machine translation for the text, and I hope you understand!
